mapper.insert: insert into member (id, pwd, name, nick, gender, zipcode, addr1, addr2, phone, email, birthdate) values (#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{nick}, #{gender}, #{zipcode}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{birthdate})
mapper.select: select id from member where name = #{name} AND email = #{email}
select count(*) as count from member where id = #{id} and name = #{name} and email = #{email}
mapper.update: update member set pwd = #{pwd} where id = #{findid};
